email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer you a freight rate for 25,000MT of soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the M/V OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 230m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th October, and the initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 40.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the loading window?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 41.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th October. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 41.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Elena,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Santos on 1st October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Soybeans from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Elena Martinez
Global Freight
